documents.document: The further you remove yourself from reality, the harder the fall
When somebody starts talking and your gag reflex literally goes off signalling the alarm to throw up
Pulls up in the car park and analysing the reg plate of the cars to determine if you're going to have a good or bad shift
FACT: If you ever happen to get stuck behind a Volvo you can be guaranteed to be late to your destination
If an emotion could be described in a punctuation mark like: ???
Mood: tempted to my some 'china' purely for smashing purposes

I imagine my autobiography would be called something along the lines of:
"Spooning a cushion, the story of my life"
Evidentially my current train of thought isn't looking positive and I see the tracks finish on a cliff edge
Why am I even on this planet. My not 'Mars' were I'd suffocate or 'Mercury' were I'd instantly be incinerated into ashes...

I suppose I could be mildly attractive if you stood approximately 20m* away from me and squinted your eyes
*metres not miles
Could my kidney serve as a form of currency on the black market to help pay for tear duct removal?
Researching into "tear duct removal surgery" and finding out that such a procedure isn't even legal...
Am I the only person who has the unique ability to cut with both the regular scissors and the special left ones?
Personally I'd happily participate in an annual purge if it meant I got to play out my fantasy of knocking someone out with a shovel.
Honestly believe I've out stayed my welcome in Devon, it's time to push the reset button again...
LIFE UPDATE: I HAVE HAD ENOUGH!!!
Disclaimer: this gym outfit was brought to you by Darth Vader
Jesus Christ I'm going to slaughtered whilst going for a shit on the toilet

There's people coming up the driveway and I'm having a quick flick through my inventory like
*2 axes* *chainsaw* *sledgehammer* *shovel*
Just walking to the garage to retrieve an item out of my axe collection so I fed off these trespassers.
When you make a joint pact with a friend to kill you dependent on how your future turns out.
Do you ever look at somebody and come to the sudden realisation that they're a representation of your future self?
When you're trying to navigate through a sandstorm and your hat gets whipped off your head & you have to run the ENTIRE length of the beach
Nothing better then having hot water on demand

@Tashaa_W80
2) they stumble across the fact you're a serial killer yourself and praise me

@Tashaa_W80 one of two things
1) I'd be honoured to have the privilege of having a role in your death
@Tashaa_W80 the sad truth is I'm not in to pass on the message, so your remains will have to go unrecovered

Both my bank balance and my self esteem has two levels:
1) I'm a worthless piece of shit
2) Bow down to me, I am your queen
@Tashaa_W80 as long as it matches the temperature of your heart, you'll be fine...
Sat here trying to plan where I should walk the dogs...
Happy friend(S) day on facebook, they say friends as if they think the 'plural' term applies to me
Washing my face and the temptation to slip and drown in the bathroom sink in some form of "final destination" moment is too great.
When you wait for everybody to go on to bed so you can safely cry in your own company.
Threw my USB charger out the window in frustration and had to run out into the garden to find it
Can my 2 favourite people kindly make their way to their PlayStations and sign in.
Obviously I've selected to live my life played out on *extreme* difficulty... I fancied my chances but was evidently WRONG
Imagine when u came out the womb if a *start* screen popped up, asking u to select a difficulty setting for the entire duration of ur life

Parents: what did you spend all your money on?
Me: Nike *ecetera*
Feeling productive and by productive, the extent of that is buying Mondays cinema tickets.
Literally can't wait to squeeze into a pair of tights later.
Warning: do not go *emotional shopping*
Both my dogs, applying a tag team effort to the situation, have managed to capture and slaughter a wasp... proud, proud owner
Apart of me really hates having days off because I'm lost with what to do
3 years ago today was the best day of my life, now look where I am... on the other end of the fucking spectrum
Pretty much wondering through life like I'm stranded out at sea
Decided no level of effort is going to be able to change things, just going to accept everything as it is and learn to live with it.
*crawls back underneath the rock I came from*
When you sit there patiently waiting for people to wake up... like earth to lindsie
Think tomorrow is going to be a solo trip to the Nike store and a Starbucks 💁
Sometimes a simple "thank you" isn't enough to express just how thankful you are to have people around you.
Need to develop a sassy little walk
Do you ever purposely not message people, because you're conscious of just how much you bother them with your presence

At my absolute lowest I weighed 35kg (5 1/2 stone) hoping to make it to my 5th anniversary weighing 95kg.
Current weight 88kg (13.8 stone)
I'm not a praying man but Nan's finally got an operation date, thank the lord.
Why is it sex scenes only ever pop up in the presence of other family members?
Gut feeling: 2017 isn't going to be my year
What's the point in me having days off if I have nothing to do
Me: why do people hate me? Inner me: *you're opinionated, angry, problematic, sarcastic and sad amongst other qualities* Me: oh right...
Seriously when can we start cloning specific people?
When somebody tries passing a comment that you're work uniform is too tight... "do I look like I remotely value your opinion"...
Planning my day off like: Is it acceptable to go for a pub lunch on your own
Thank the lord, I found a stash of caffeine pills this morning
Don't know what's more torturous, being on shift with your favourite colleague(s) or NOT being on shift with them
Seriously Valentine's displays everywhere... February is going to be a miserable month
Just been trying to dry my hands under the "soap dispenser" - testament to how tired I am
Having a rather late urge to go a Netflix binge

Feeling like a thick, dumb, dopey, dozy, crazy, barmy, cretinous, birdbrained, pea-brained, foolish idiot*
*Basically a string of synonyms
@Tashaa_W80 it is undeniable awesome!!!
Literally hate reaching out to friends, I feel the need to be overly apologetic because I'm nothing more than a constant annoyance. Sorry.
Please pass me the scissors so I can play the violin along my veins
When your step dads masculinity is so frail he starts calling you a "pansy" and "pussy" for watching the likes of B… https://t.co/TGEqDklOyL
Let's face it, my life holds no value to anybody else
Peaky blinders are looking for male boxers as extras... I'm a hair puller by default, but I hope they accept my application
Bridget jones baby followed by first dates... Monday is good
Got cramp in my middle finger, so I can no longer scroll or swear...
It should be a crime for being single for this length of time, therefore please punish me with the death sentence, preferably injection.
"The sarcasm is strong in this one"

When someone changes over the TV channel
"Oi! I’m a Shelby too, you know. Put my fucking film back on!"
@GeorgiaStraff_x seriously though... https://t.co/EiemDDqeQb
Seriously what family has disco fireplace lights... we do
*rolls into a cocoon, hoping to awake as a beautiful butterfly*
I lied, there's actually nothing more frustrating, then google failing to provide you with the answers you either need or want.
There's nothing worse then a civil war played out on the battlegrounds that coexist is your brain... #internalstruggles
A girly night in means my alter ego; Patricia, gets to step out into the light.
@Tashaa_W80 you'll have to borrow season 3, simples
I'm naming this workout: "gym wars: attack on the cleavage" #chest
Waiting for a break in the rain to make a runner but it seemingly just gets worse and worse
At some stage, I'll contemplate emptying the contents of my shopping bags in order to save my hair in the rain.
Coldplay's first album + a coffee = 👌

Hand on heart best 2 purchases of 2017:
Bridget Jones's Baby Peaky Blinders season 3
CEX as a store basically smells like the breeding ground of someone's armpit
It's no different to smoking, you don't blow a vapour in someone's face
Just bringing back my workplace theory, that ladders are there for staff members to throw themselves off of.
You know you're tired when your brain perfects the ability to read from "right" to "left"
Tucking your dog into your bed before you leave for work...
This linx deodorant smells like the contents of a Heinz soup can
Pilau rice for breakfast... WILD!!!

Utilises "quick draw" and squirts* at a spider with chemicals.
*with or without pistol sounds, being made for added effect.
Telling myself all I need to do is make it through these next 6 days then I'm off for a week
Still sat patiently awaiting the arrival of karma 13 years later... I hope they've gone to great lengths with the preparations.
